Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 2nd overall pick, by Houston in 1984...
Earned first career win on 4/8/1987...
Won Gold Glove Award at Pitcher in 1987...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/7/1991, winning 2 games with a 0.50 ERA...

Won World Series with Houston in 1995...
